titleStmt.title: The art of logick deliuered in the precepts of Aristotle and Ramus. VVherein 1. The agreement of both authors is declared. 2. The defects in Ramus, are supplyed, and his superfluities pared off, by the precepts of Aristotle. 3. The precepts of both, are expounded and applyed to vse, by the assistance of the best schoolemen. By Tho: Spencer.
titleStmt.author: Spencer, Thomas, fl. 1628-1629.

The defects in Ramus, are supplyed, and his superfluities pared off, by the precepts of Aristotle. 3. The precepts of both, are expounded and applyed to vse, by the assistance of the best schoolemen. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for Nicholas Bourne, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The art of logicke.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
